title: Chilli chicken soup
ingredients: ['4 bone-in chicken thighs', '100g diced pancetta', '1 onion, diced', '1 carrot, diced', '2 sticks celery, diced', '1 pepper, any colour, de-seeded and diced', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '5cm piece root ginger, finely chopped', '2 fat red chillies, finely chopped (you might want to only use one).', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 1/2 pints chicken stock', '3 oz each frozen sweetcorn and peas']
